item.description:
5 week swing dance workshop:

April 15, 29, May 6,13,20

NOTE: no class on Good Friday 4/22

We will be learning different versions of swing: east coast, west coast, single, triple and maybe others I don't even know about!  No partner required.  Bring your friends!

$10 per class; must be paid for 5 weeks upfront in full.  6 people minimum required, otherwise I will have to cancel.

Parking is in the pay lot behind the Fours.  The lot has been pretty crowded due to construction and the Red Sox season having started.  The studio is hard to find as the entrance is not on Cottage Ave.  There is an alley immediately to the left of the Fours and the entrance to the studio is off this alley, right next to a fire escape.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Swing Dance 5 week workshop
